lead_paragraph: A bronze bust of the Hall of Fame third baseman George Brett was found in a box in a roadside ditch yesterday after it was stolen this week from the Missouri Sports Hall of Fame. An unidentified person found the box near the Lake of the Ozarks community of Camdenton and called sheriff’s deputies, the sheriff’s office said.
